description: A short tube filled with titanium baffles.  Can be attached to a shorter Fly suppressor to extend it, exchanging its compactness for better sound suppression.

variants.description: A short titanium tube filled with baffles.  Can be attached to a shorter Fly 9 to extend it, exchanging its compactness for better performance.  <variant:black>

//weight: weight of full suppressor (7.9 oz = 223.96 g) - weight of shortened supressor (5.5 oz = 155.92 g) = 68.04 g
